remarks: If all of the terms of a finite sum are nonnegative, so is the sum. (Contributed by NM, 26-Dec-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fsumge0.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumge0.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
fsumge0.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> 0 <_ B ) $.
fsumge0 $p |- ( ph -> 0 <_ sum_ k e. A B ) $.
$d A k $.
$d k ph $.
